contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = Ocenebrinae | image = Ceratostoma foliatum.jpg | image_caption = A live individual of ''[[Ceratostoma foliatum]]'', head end towards the lower left | regnum = [[Animalia]] | phylum = [[Mollusca]] | classis = [[Gastropoda]] | unranked_superfamilia = clade [[Caenogastropoda]]<br/>clade [[Hypsogastropoda]]<br/>clade [[Neogastropoda]] | superfamilia = [[Muricoidea]] | familia = [[Muricidae]] | subfamilia = '''Ocenebrinae''' | subfamilia_authority = [[Maurice Cossmann|Cossmann]], 1903 | subdivision_ranks = Genera | subdivision = ''See text'' }} '''Ocenebrinae''' is a [[taxonomic]] [[subfamily]] of [[predatory]] [[sea snail]]s, [[marine (ocean)|marine]] [[gastropod]] [[mollusk]]s. This subfamily is within the large family [[Muricidae]], which are commonly known as the murex and rock snails. In one{{Which?|date=May 2010}} other version of current gastropod [[Taxonomy (biology)|taxonomy]], three of these genera are grouped by themselves in a small subfamily called [[Haustrinae]].{{Citation needed|date=May 2010}} ==Genera== Genera within the subfamily Ocenebrinae include: * ''[[Acanthina]]'' ** ''[[Acanthina paucilirata]]'' ** ''[[Acanthina punctulata]]'' ** ''[[Acanthina lugubris]]'' ** ''[[Acanthina spirata]]'' * ''[[Africanella]]'' * ''[[Agnewia]]'' * ''[[Calcitrapessa]]'' * ''[[Ceratostoma]]'' * ''[[Chicocenebra]]'' * ''[[Chorus (genus)|Chorus]]'' **''[[Chorus giganteus]]'' * ''[[Crassilabrum]]'' * ''[[Eupleura]]'' * ''[[Favartia]]'' * ''[[Forreria]]'' * ''[[Genkaimurex]]'' * ''[[Hadriania]]'' * ''[[Hanetia]]'' * ''[[Haustrum]]'' * ''[[Inermicosta]]'' * ''[[Jaton]]'' * ''[[Lepsiella]]'' * ''[[Lepsithais]]'' * ''[[Microrhytis]]'' * ''[[Muricopsis]]'' * ''[[Namamurex]]'' * ''[[Neothais]]'' * ''[[Nucella]]'' * ''[[Ocenebra]]'' * ''[[Ocinebrellus]]'' * ''[[Ocinebrina]]'' * ''[[Poropteron]]'' * ''[[Pteropurpura]]'' * ''[[Pterotyphis]]'' * ''[[Roperia]]'' * ''[[Shaskyus]]'' * ''[[Trachypollia]]'' * ''[[tritoniformis]]'' * ''[[Urosalpinx]]'' * ''[[Vaughtia]]'' * ''[[Vitularia]]'' Fossil genera: * ''[[Ecphora]]'' ==References== * [http://www.mollusca.co.nz/checklist/checklist_frameset.htm NZ mollusca] {{wikispecies}} [[Category:Muricidae]] {{Muricidae-stub}}
